00019 #ifndef _FFT_RESULT_CALIBRATED_SPECTRUM_PEAK_HPP_cm101026_
00020 #define _FFT_RESULT_CALIBRATED_SPECTRUM_PEAK_HPP_cm101026_
00021 
00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time_io.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/filesystem.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/filesystem/fstream.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/format.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/SpectrumPeak.hpp"
00031 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/Calibration.hpp"
00032 
00033 namespace Result {
00034   class CalibratedSpectrumPeak : public SpectrumPeak {
00035   public:
00036     typedef boost::shared_ptr<SpectrumPeak> sptr;
00037     typedef boost::shared_ptr<SpectrumPeak> Handle;
00038     CalibratedSpectrumPeak(ptime time,
00039                            double fReference,
00040                            Calibration::Handle calibrationHandle)
00041       : SpectrumPeak(time, fReference)
00042       , calibrationHandle_(calibrationHandle) {
00043       processor::result_base::set_name("CalibratedSpectrumPeak");
00044     }
00045     virtual ~CalibratedSpectrumPeak() {}
00046 
00047     virtual std::string toString() const { 
00048       std::stringstream ss; 
00049       ss << SpectrumPeak::toString()
00050          << " diff=" << fMeasured()-fReference();
00051       return ss.str();
00052     }
00053 
00054     virtual std::pair<double, double> cal(double f) const {
00055       return calibrationHandle_->uncal2cal(f);
00056     }
00057 
00058     virtual std::ostream& dump_header(std::ostream& os) const {      
00059       return SpectrumPeak::dump_header(os) << "diff_Hz ";
00060     }
00061     virtual std::ostream& dump_data(std::ostream& os) const {
00062       return SpectrumPeak::dump_data(os) 
00063         << boost::format("%8.3f")  % (fMeasured()-fReference()) << " ";
00064     }
00065 
00066   private:
00067     Calibration::Handle calibrationHandle_;
00068   } ;
00069 } // namespace Result
00070 
00071 #endif // _FFT_RESULT_CALIBRATED_SPECTRUM_PEAK_HPP_cm101026_
